body: Ken Opalo reacts to a story that Somali transitional government is reported to be soliciting for help from the American security firm Blackwater: "My position on Somalia remains that those with power – guns and the majority of the people’s (revealed) hearts and minds – should be allowed to govern, regardless of their ideological leanings."

title: Somalia: Those with guns should be allowed to govern
